meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kelsey Morgan Joe Bartolomeo Amanda Berofsky Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7439.

td.p: Kelsey Morgan, an actuary from Charlottesville, Virginia
Joe Bartolomeo, a professor and associate dean from Florence, Massachusetts
Amanda Berofsky, a quality assurance analyst from Waterford, Michigan (whose 2-day cash winnings total $15,998)

tr.td: THE SHAPE OF THINGS
ALSO A BASKETBALL TERM
BEEN THERE, DONE THAT
A FILM CLASSIC
SHARK!
NATO

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Amanda
Joe
Kelsey
AMERICAN LITERATURE
AT THE BALLET
KNOWN BY THEIR MIDDLE NAMES
FILE UNDER "L"
CANADIAN LAKES
A VISIT WITH RITA MORENO
(Rita Moreno: I'm Rita Moreno with some clues about my career.) (Alex: And she's had a long and distinguished career.)
